It's saying that the command line you used said to use those parameters to launch the class net.minecraft.LauncherFrame, but it can't find that class. I've been trying to get cracked minecraft to allocate more memory but so far no luck.

P.S. You don't even need the command line to launch this. You can just run the exe. The net.minecraft.LauncherFrame error seems to be fixed with 1.6.6 being out.
